name: Lazer Figther Demo
description:
Here is another from my collect of learning to make games. Simple yet challenging space fighter! Let's see who can get the highest score! Share it here and with your friends! Enjoy and have fun! 

This game is posted as a Demo because, I don't plan to make anymore changes unless enough people love it and want more. So, if you love it let me know!

Controls are simple: w,a,s,d to move and space to fire. Press esc in game to return to the menu.

Here is a link to my music

https://opengameart.org/content/game-game

Here is a link for the sprites

https://opengameart.org/content/1616-ship-collection
